Berserk:




Berserk looked at Drill Bit's hand then back at his face. "I was sent 
here by force by the Predacon council on Cybertron. I was declaired 
unsafe among the public. I thought this planet was a penal colony. Is 
it?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He was shocked that the bot looked like Megatron. But tryed not to 
show
> it.
> "Prisoner? No. I came to Earth, to fight in the Neo Beast Wars."
> He offered his hand, for a shake.
> "I'm Commander DrillBit. Co-commander of this group of Predicons."
